user_page_for.en: This is the OpenID user page for %USERID%.

login_view_own_page.en: Log in to view your own OpenID page.

your_identifier.en: To log in with your OpenID identifier, use the following identifier:

howto_delegate.en: You can also delegate a different identifier to use this OpenID provider. To do that, you need to add the following to the <head>-element on the webpage of that identifier:

logout.en: Click here to log out of your OpenID user.

confirm_question.en: Do you wish to log on to %SITEURL%?

trustlist_nosites.en: No sites are trusted. When you authenticate with a site, you can choose to add it to this list by choosing <q>Remember this decision</q>.
